DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ecabet ophthalmic solution effective treatment dry eye syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Ecabet Ophthalmic Solution Treating Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Agree avoid systemic & topical ophthalmic med & disallow med Have best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/40 pinhole good eye Diagnosis moderate dry eye syndrome Uncontrolled ocular systemic disease could interfere study Diagnosis Sjogren 's syndrome , lacrimal obstruction , reflex , lidrelated contact lensrelated dry eye syndrome ( DES ) ; significant anterior blepharitis meibomianitis Contraindications hypersensitivity use study med component Wear contact lenses Secondary dry eye surgery Eye surgery ( include laser ) within 6 month Use systemic topical ophthalmic med within 14 day Punctal plug one eyes place < 45 day Permanent occlusion lacrimal puncta
